import { format } from "date-fns"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import './Post.css'; export default function Post({ _id, title, summary, cover, content, createdAt, author, upvotes }) { return ( <>

{title}

{author.username} {format(new Date(createdAt), 'dd MMM yyyy')}

); }
